summary: This mod adds descriptions to unique weapons such as Dawnbreaker, Mace of Molag Bal, Volendrung and so on. A small mod to add an idea of what the weapon is about or just plain description of what it does.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds descriptions to weapons and armor during quests!
(Unique weapons such as Daedric artifacts like Mehrunes' Razor from Mehrunes' Dagon)
So far I've added a description to: (V1_3)
- Wabbajack
- The Rueful Axe
- Volendrung
- DawnBreaker
- Mehrunes' Razor
- Mace of Molag Bal
- Rusty Mace (The before placement of Mace of Molag Bal)
- Blade of Woe
- Sanguine Rose
- Ghost Blade
- Wuuthrad
- Blade of Sacrifice
- Chillrend
- Blades Sword
- Daedric Sword
- Woodcutter's Axe
- Bloodthorn
- Chef's Hat
- Chef's Tunic
- All Penitus Oculatus armor
- Mystery armor!
- Forsworn Arrow
- Nettlebane
- Gold and Emerald Circlet

CHANGELOG IN ZIP!

Squinting may be a problem for some people, I read it off just fine. Please make note that I can't really do anything about this unless I remove a bit of text, which then there would be no point of this mod. I will be working to see what I can do.
(If anyone wants to volunteer to help with this, send a message!)


I KNOW THE IMAGES LOOK STRETCHED, CLICK IT, IT WILL COME TO RESOLUTION!
People seem to skip over files because of simple under-resolution pictures. ^^^
___________________________________________________________________________
This is for all versions, I am gonna keep it simple, 1.9 and beyond!

Since this is the first version there ARE many English failures, since I am not even in high school yet, they are more or less grammatical errors rather than spelling failures.

I will be adding more to this, even if no one uses it, I like to keep this for myself if no one bothers this modification.

Note: This is a simple mod, any dumbed mind can do this themselves, please, keep that in mind..

Yes! I know, my name is a bit ridiculous! I would like to be referred as UnitedCyborgCats, named after my YouTube channel BritishCyborgCats which I now refer to as UnitedCyborgCats.

CREDITS: I would like to thank FallenTormentor home to the Nexus for helping me correct descriptions and also I would like to thank my friend Ryan (ShiroAustin) for helping me correct and rewriting the descriptions, thanks to you both! And I also thank everyone who shown support so far, I will definitely be updating much more.
FallenTormentor: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/790880-fallentormentor/
ShiroAustin: http://www.youtube.com/user/ShiroAustin
author: ComedyGamePlayer

Screenshots of these can be found at the main modding page.
